name: eathena-test
short_description: eAthena is a collaborative software development project revolving around the creation of a robust massively multiplayer online role playing game (MMORPG) server package. Written in C, the program is very versatile and provides NPCs, warps and modifications. The project is jointly managed by a group of volunteers located around the world as well as a tremendous community providing QA and support. eAthena is a continuation of the original jAthena project.
summary: eAthena is an open-source cross-platform MMORPG server
